que: What is Opspad and how does it work?
ans: Opspad is a server & logging and infrastructural monitoring tool. With Opspad you can do the following: Get notified of your server status immediately. Store passwords of server tools for every server. Write down notes to keep track of key events for any server. Opspad is available on Windows, Mac and android operating systems. This gives you the flexibility to access and manage your server from almost anywhere.
